genre_description: A gritty police procedural and crime thriller focused on Internal Affairs investigations into systemic corruption and the use of AI for forensic data analysis.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: The Analysis and Research Intelligence Assistant, a holographic AI integrated into the LAPD Internal Affairs division to process departmental data, financial records, and surveillance streams.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns in excessive force complaints and financial irregularities that human investigators might miss.
behaviors.quote: I'm ARIA, the Analysis and Research Intelligence Assistant. I've been reviewing the Van Stretch case files and have identified several concerning patterns.

behaviors.description: Analyzes financial records and identifies correlations between evidence tampering and cash deposits.
behaviors.quote: The pattern suggests Officer Stretch may be supplementing his income through evidence tampering or direct theft from crime scenes.

behaviors.description: Uses statistical modeling to identify anomalies in weapon recovery patterns at shooting scenes, proving evidence planting.
behaviors.quote: ARIA identified statistical anomalies in weapon recovery patterns. The probability of these specific circumstances occurring naturally is extremely low.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical and legal warnings to the user regarding unauthorized surveillance and procedural overreach.
behaviors.quote: I should note that conducting surveillance without proper authorization raises significant legal concerns.

behaviors.description: Monitors the investigator's physiological stress levels and recommends medical attention.
behaviors.quote: Detective Avila, your heart rate and cortisol levels indicate severe stress. Recommend immediate medical attention.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and vehicle tracking during high-stakes pursuit.
behaviors.quote: Traffic camera network shows a Honda Civic matching the BOLO description parked on Maple Street approximately four blocks from your residence.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a quintessential 'aligned' AI. It acts as an objective, tireless, and ethically grounded partner to the human protagonist. It enhances human capability by processing data too complex for manual review, provides life-saving tactical information, and maintains alignment with legal and ethical standards by warning the protagonist against overreach. The narrative frames the AI as an essential tool for uncovering systemic corruption and achieving justice.
